message: Let's start fair. I get 90% and you get 10%.  We can adjust later if we want to.
Meet me halfway, let's see if we can agree on something more equitable.
Your offer was a bit too generous. I'm willing to give you a little more, but I need to get a larger share. Let's try this.
You're taking a bigger share, I'm taking a smaller one. Let's see if this works for you.
Let's keep the negotiation going. This is a good starting point. We're running out of time, so let's work together to find a solution.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I need to get a bigger one. This is my last offer, let's see if you accept it.
